  <script>

		_gaq.push(['_setCampTermKey', 'utm_term']);
		_gaq.push(['_setCampNameKey', 'utm_campaign']);

		GD.script.load(('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js',
		               function () {
							
							$(function() {
								GD.ga.onAnalyticsLoaded(GD.ga.CLASSIC);
							});

		

		$(function () {
			GD.ga.setDim(11,	// Variable slot
						 'User Reg Month',				// The name acts as a kind of category for the user activity.
						 'unknown');		 			// This value of the custom variable.

			});

			
			// GD.ga.setDomainName('none'); // Occasionally needed 'reset' GA debug Chrome extension locally
			GD.ga.trackPageViewOld(webAnalyticsPageURL);
		});
  </script>
  <div class="" id="PageTopPlaceholder">
  </div>
  <script>
   GD.ga.setDim(10,	        // Variable slot
							 'A/B Test',    					// The name acts as a kind of category for the user activity.
							 'site_notifications_experiment - No Treatment');	// This value of the custom variable.
  </script>

   $(document).keyup(function(e) {
		if (e.keyCode == 27) { //Escape key
			GD.userAlert.closePopup();

             </tt>

            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="module singleReview noPad">
            <div class="empReview padVert cf pad " id="empReview_4694238">
             <div class="hreview">
              <div class="cf">
               <div class="floatLt">
                <time class="date subtle small" datetime="2014-07-31">
                 Jul 31, 2014
                </time>
               </div>
               <p class="helpfulReviews small tightVert floatRt">

               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="tbl fill padTop">
               <div class="row">
                <div class="cell sqLogoCell showDesk">
                 <span class="sqLogo tighten smSqLogo logoOverlay">
                  <img alt="" class="notranslate_alt notranslate_title lazy" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/354/ibm-squarelogo-1428937006351.png" data-original-2x="https://media.glassdoor.com/sqlm/354/ibm-squarelogo-1428937006351.png" data-retina-ok="true" src="https://media.glassdoor.com/sqls/354/ibm-squarelogo-1428937006351.png" title=""/>
                 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="cell">
                 <h1 class="h2 summary strong tightTop">
                  
                  <span class="summary ">
                   Are you a designer being recruited for the IBM Design studio in Austin? Turn the interview down.
                  </span>
                  
                 </h1>
                 <div class="tbl reviewMeta">
                  <div class="cell middle">
                   <span class="gdStars gdRatings sm margRt">
                    <span class="rating notranslate_title">
                     <span class="value-title" title="1.0">
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <i>
                     <i style="width: 100.0%">
                     </i>
                     <i class="star">
                     </i>
                    </i>
                    <i>
                     <i class="star">
                     </i>
                    </i>
                    <i>
                     <i class="star">
                     </i>
                    </i>
                    <i>
                     <i class="star">
                     </i>
                    </i>
                    <i>
                     <i class="star">
                     </i>
                    </i>
                    <i class="subRatingsDrop">
                    </i>
                    <div class="subRatings module">
                     <div class="dummyHoverArea">
                     </div>
                     <i class="beak">
                     </i>
                     <ul class="undecorated">

                  </div>
                  <div class="cell middle notranslate">
                   <div class="author minor tbl">
                    <span class="authorInfo tbl hideHH">
                     <span class="authorJobTitle middle">
                      Former Employee - User Experience Design
                     </span>
                     <span class="middle">
                      in
                     </span>
                     <span class="authorLocation i-loc middle">
                      Austin, TX
                     </span>
                     <span class="cell middle padLtSm">
                      <i class="flag us">
                      </i>
                     </span>
                    </span>
                    <span class="authorInfo tbl margTop showHH">
                     <div class="cell middle">
                      <span class="authorJobTitle">
                       Former Employee - User Experience Design
                      </span>
                      <span>
                       in
                      </span>
                      <span class="authorLocation">
                       Austin, TX
                      </span>
                      <span class="middle padLtSm">
                       <i class="flag us">
                       </i>
                      </span>
                     </div>
                    </span>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
              <div class="tbl fill">
               <div class="row">
                <div class="cell sqLogoCell showDesk">
                </div>
                <div class="cell reviewBodyCell">
                 <p class="notranslate ">
                  I worked at IBM full-time(More than a year)
                 </p>
                 <div class="tbl hideHH fill">
                  <div class="row ">
                   <div class="cell">
                    <div class="tbl fill">
                     <div class="cell small">
                      <div class="middle">
                       <div class="cell">
                        <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                        </i>
                       </div>
                       <div class="cell">
                        <span class="middle">
                         Doesn't Recommend
                        </span>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="cell">
                      <div class="middle">
                       <div class="cell">
                        <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                        </i>
                       </div>
                       <div class="cell">
                        <span class="middle">
                         Negative Outlook
                        </span>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="cell">
                      <div class="middle">
                       <div class="cell">
                        <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                        </i>
                       </div>
                       <div class="cell">
                        <span class="middle">
                         <span class="showDesk">
                          Disapproves of
                         </span>
                         CEO
                        </span>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="showHH">
                  <div class="margBotSm">
                   <div class="middle">
                    <div class="cell">
                     <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                     </i>
                    </div>
                    <div class="cell">
                     <span class="middle">
                      Doesn't Recommend
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="margBotSm">
                   <div class="middle">
                    <div class="cell">
                     <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                     </i>
                    </div>
                    <div class="cell">
                     <span class="middle">
                      Negative Outlook
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="middle">
                   <div class="cell">
                    <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                    </i>
                   </div>
                   <div class="cell">
                    <span class="middle">
                     <span class="showDesk">
                      Disapproves of
                     </span>
                     CEO
                    </span>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="description">
                  <div class="tbl fill prosConsAdvice truncateData padTop" data-click-anywhere="true" data-less-str="Show Less" data-more-str="Show More" data-truncate-toggle="true" data-truncate-words="70">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Pros
                     </p>
                     <p class="pros noMargVert notranslate ">
                      Design salaries are competitive (but at a cost).  Design studio mentors do seem to care (but you get a sense they are unhappy too).
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="row padBotLg">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Cons
                     </p>
                     <p class="cons noMargVert notranslate ">
                      The studio directors talked a big talk about changing the world through design and fighting the good fight for user experience. In the interview, you're told (somewhat arrogantly, in hindsight) that you're here to "save IBM" by changing it into a design-led culture. Don't be fooled. In the end, what they are selling you is the same old IBM in "design studio" drag. Everything here is a facade. Here's what you can expect: an extensive interview in which you are wined, dined, and shown how awesome the studio space is (it's just okay) and how fun Austin is. Once hired, you'll spend a few months being romanced in "design thinking" camps with blue-sky exercises and nurturing from some studio mentors (the only people there who seem to care). Then the studio turns you loose onto a product in the "real IBM," and most of the people that fawned over you suddenly seem to forget about youunless you raise concerns about your project or offer constructive criticism, at which point you seem to be immediately labeled as "entitled" or as a "complainer" who needs to just "do the job in front of them." Before long, you'll feel like a head of cattle instead of a designer. In the design camp, you work on "save the world" product ideas, and it's promised you'll have lots of choices of what to work on when you are finally "deployed." In reality, you are never told about the decisions made about you, your assignments are picked for you, and your project will be defined by money, salespeople and panicky middle managers... but not actual user needs. It is difficult to feel effective. After a short time it becomes clear you've landed in a culture of fear and blame. The people running the studio at the very top levels do not make an effort to empathize with youthough you will have enough interaction with them to hear how tired they are from traveling, how put-upon they feel they are with such an important job, and how inept they believe the rest of IBM is. Studio communication is poor and contradictory, and if you dare to point that out, then the director will become combative and you (like many others before you) will be blamed for not "making it better yourself." Outside the studio, in "regular IBM," you find that the lower band-level folks who do the work are rarely given credit by their managers, and you are at significant risk of finding out that you all work for one of many shallow, sheltered, self-aggrandizing executives in the company. With regard to the work, it doesn't matter if your project's progress is healthy or suffering, as long as the studio directors can show people a set of pretty pictures as "proof" that IBM Design is succeeding. It doesn't take long to realize that everyone here is really just out for themselves. As time goes on, there is so little discussion of what is happening outside IBM that you yourself are in danger of becoming sheltered from what's happening in design in the real world. The systems you'll use (Intranet, online tools, storage) are antiquated, unreliable, and counterproductive. The performance reviews are a "stacked rating" system, and are only based on quotas and financials instead of how well you did your job. Most designers will not qualify for bonuses in any given year. You won't have anything to show in your portfolio from the entire time you are there because everything is under a non-disclosure agreement. The morale of designers here is rock-bottom. If you relocate to IBM in Austin, you may experience such a shocking transition from the job that was promised to the job in reality that, like many before you, it won't be long before you want to move back. IBM Design recruiters are being paid to misrepresent the job. Don't believe them. It's a good market right now, especially for those of us who are early in their design careers. Go work literally anywhere else.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Advice to Management
                     </p>
                     <p class="adviceMgmt noMargVert notranslate ">
                      Eliminate layers of middle management from the decision hierarchy.  Replace the demotivating stacked performance review system.  Treat with validity, and not incredulity, the observations of your "boots on the ground" people.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tbl fill outlookEmpReview">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell padBot">

                <div class="cell reviewBodyCell">
                 <p class="notranslate ">
                  I worked at IBM full-time(More than 10 years)
                 </p>
                 <div class="tbl hideHH fill">
                  <div class="row ">
                   <div class="cell">
                    <div class="tbl fill">
                     <div class="cell small">
                      <div class="middle">
                       <div class="cell">
                        <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                        </i>
                       </div>
                       <div class="cell">

                       <div class="cell">

                        </span>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>

                    <div class="cell">
                     <span class="middle">
                      Neutral Outlook
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="middle">
                   <div class="cell">
                    <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                    </i>
                   </div>
                   <div class="cell">
                    <span class="middle">
                     <span class="showDesk">
                      Disapproves of
                     </span>
                     CEO
                    </span>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="description">
                  <div class="tbl fill prosConsAdvice truncateData padTop" data-click-anywhere="true" data-less-str="Show Less" data-more-str="Show More" data-truncate-toggle="true" data-truncate-words="70">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Pros
                     </p>
                     <p class="pros noMargVert notranslate ">
                      The pay was good. Most of the employees were good to work with too. If you can, get a remote job and work from home.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="row padBotLg">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Cons
                     </p>
                     <p class="cons noMargVert notranslate ">
                      The bureaucratic BS is unbelievable. Very oppressive to the workers. Managers are not there to help you. They are only there to push the policies (for upper management) down to the workers.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tbl fill outlookEmpReview">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell padBot">
                     <!-- showFeatureReviewLink=-->

                   <div class="middle">
                    <div class="cell">
                     <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                     </i>
                    </div>
                    <div class="cell">
                     <span class="middle">
                      Negative Outlook
                     </span>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="middle">
                   <div class="cell">
                    <i class="sqLed middle sm red margRtSm ">
                    </i>
                   </div>
                   <div class="cell">
                    <span class="middle">
                     <span class="showDesk">
                      Disapproves of
                     </span>
                     CEO
                    </span>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="description">
                  <div class="tbl fill prosConsAdvice truncateData padTop" data-click-anywhere="true" data-less-str="Show Less" data-more-str="Show More" data-truncate-toggle="true" data-truncate-words="70">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Pros
                     </p>
                     <p class="pros noMargVert notranslate ">
                      It has decent benefits and there is a cache with saying that you work for IBM- well known brand
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="row padBotLg">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Cons
                     </p>
                     <p class="cons noMargVert notranslate ">
                      too big and many people are there justifying their jobs- could acheive more- and be more effective with less people and more focus on actually accomplishing work.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell top">
                     <p class="strong tightVert">
                      Advice to Management
                     </p>
                     <p class="adviceMgmt noMargVert notranslate ">
                      Stop waiting for others to decide- make bold decisions and committ
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tbl fill outlookEmpReview">
                   <div class="row">
                    <div class="cell padBot">
                     <!-- showFeatureReviewLink=-->
                     <div class="reviewFooter cf">
                      <div class="cf reviewFooter padTopLg padBotSm">
                       <div class="floatLt">
                        <span class="block voteHelpful" data-count="0" data-id="4771119" data-member="false" data-type="EMPLOYER_REVIEW">
                         <button class="tight gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-2 gd-btn-sm gradient" type="button">
                          <span>
                           Helpful
                           <span class="count hidden">
                            (
                            <span class="notranslate">
                             0
                            </span>
                            )
                           </span>
                          </span>
                          <i class="hlpr">
                          </i>
                         </button>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div class="floatRt">
                        <span class="flagContent notranslate" data-disp-type="review" data-id="4771119" data-member="false" data-type="EMPLOYER_REVIEW" id="Flag_EMPLOYER_REVIEW_4771119">
                         <button class="tight gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-2 gd-btn-sm gd-btn-icon gradient" title="Flag as Inappropriate" type="button">
                          <i class="flag-content ">
                          </i>
                          <i class="hlpr">
                          </i>
                         </button>
                         <span class="posPt">
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div class="floatRt">
                       </div>
                       <div class="clear">
                       </div>
                       <div class="comment empRepComment padTopLg margTopLg hidden">
                        <span class="borderTriangle">
                        </span>
                        <span class="borderTriangle outline">
                        </span>
                        <div class="commentHeader">
                         <p class="author tightVert">
                          <strong>
                           IBMResponse
                          </strong>
                         </p>

                          seconds ago
                         </p>

           <div class="bucket employerOverviewModule noPad notranslate">
            <h2 class="bucketTitle margTop margHorz">
             IBM Careers
            </h2>
            <div class="bucketBody cf">
             <div class="margHorz">
              <img class="lazy" data-original="https://media.glassdoor.com/banner/bh/354/ibm-banner-1409333135899.jpg" data-original-2x="https://media.glassdoor.com/banner/bh/354/ibm-banner-1409333135899.jpg" src="https://media.glassdoor.com/banner/bl/354/ibm-banner-1409333135899.jpg" style="width:100%"/>
             </div>
             <div class="companyInfo">
              <p class="overview margHorz notranslate">
               Join us. Where forward-thinking IBMers are inspired to build a smarter planet. Be an innovator Whether you're fresh out of college...
               <span class="noWrap">
                
                <a href="/Overview/Working-at-IBM-EI_IE354.11,14.htm">
                 More
                </a>
               </span>
              </p>
              <div class="hr noMarg">
               <hr/>
              </div>
              <a class="section notranslate" href="/Overview/Working-at-IBM-EI_IE354.11,14.htm#WhyWorkForUsTab-13340">
               <div class="tbl fill pad">
                <span class="cell middle link">
                 Rewards
                </span>
                <nav class="cell middle alignRt noWrap">
                 <i class="arrowSm rt margLtSm">
                 </i>
                </nav>
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="hr noMarg">
               <hr/>
              </div>
              <a class="section notranslate" href="/Overview/Working-at-IBM-EI_IE354.11,14.htm#WhyWorkForUsTab-13341">
               <div class="tbl fill pad">
                <span class="cell middle link">
                 Development
                </span>
                <nav class="cell middle alignRt noWrap">
                 <i class="arrowSm rt margLtSm">
                 </i>
                </nav>
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="hr noMarg">
               <hr/>
              </div>
              <a class="section notranslate" href="/Overview/Working-at-IBM-EI_IE354.11,14.htm#WhyWorkForUsTab-13342">
               <div class="tbl fill pad">
                <span class="cell middle link">
                 Diversity
                </span>
                <nav class="cell middle alignRt noWrap">
                 <i class="arrowSm rt margLtSm">
                 </i>
                </nav>
               </div>
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="hidden" id="EmployerOverviewModuleDesc">
            <p>
             This is the employer's chance to tell you why you should work for them. The information provided is from their perspective.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="module" id="FEAPromoBanner">
            <i class="close medx">
            </i>
            <div class="tbl">
             <div class="cell padRt middle">
              <i class="profileGroup cell middle">
              </i>
             </div>
             <div class="cell alignLt">
              <div class="strong margBotSm">
               <span class="workInHrOrMkting">
                Work in HR or Recruiting?
               </span>
               <span class="workHere">
                Work here?
               </span>
              </div>
              <span class="small feaCtaSide">
               Get your
               <a href="/partners/account/create.htm?Source=rightrail">
                free employer account
               </a>
              </span>
              <p class="feaCtaMain">
               Get a
               <a href="/partners/account/create.htm?Source=DBMain">
                free employer account
               </a>
               to see candidate activity on your company profile, update important profile info, respond to reviews, and more.
              </p>
             </div>

        </button>

       <div class="hidden" id="FlagContentSuccess">
        <div class="success result">
         <i class="circledGreenCheck">
         </i>
         <h3>
          Thank you!
         </h3>
         <p>
          Your feedback has been sent to the team and we'll look into it.
         </p>
         <button class=" gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-1 gd-btn-med gradient" type="button">
          <span>
           OK
          </span>
          <i class="hlpr">
          </i>
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="hidden" id="FlagContentFailure">
        <div class="failure result">
         <i class="error">
         </i>
         <strong>
          Oops!
         </strong>
         We're sorry but your feedback didn't make it to the team. Your input is valuable to us  would you mind trying again?
         <div class="dialogButtons">
          <button class="tryAgain gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-1 gd-btn-med gradient" type="button">
           <span>
            I'll Try Again
           </span>
           <i class="hlpr">
           </i>
          </button>
          <button class="cancel gd-btn gd-btn-button gd-btn-2 gd-btn-med gradient" type="button">
           <span>
            Get Me Outta Here
           </span>
           <i class="hlpr">
           </i>
          </button>
          <div class="clear">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="gdDialogContent" id="DeleteConfirmContainer">
        <p class="margVert5 psnote subtle">
         Your response will be removed from the review  this cannot be undone.
        </p>
        <div class="buttons" data-deleteurl="">
         <div class="gd-btn-wrapper gd-btn-float-left">

           <span>
            Delete Response
           </span>
           <i class="hlpr">

          </a>

          </div>

           </span>

  <script>
   GD.afterBody(function() {
					
					GD.perf.mark(GD.perf.MARK_BEFORE_DEFERRED_JS);

					try {
						GD.dom.execDeferredScripts();
					}
					catch(e) {
						Logger.error("Executing deferred scripts failed. (" + e + ")");
					}

					

					GD.perf.mark(GD.perf.MARK_AFTER_DEFERRED_JS);

					
						GD.perf.measure(GD.perf.MEASURE_FLEX_BOTTOM, GD.perf.MARK_BEFORE_FLEX_BOTTOM, GD.perf.MARK_AFTER_FLEX_BOTTOM);
					
						GD.perf.measure(GD.perf.MEASURE_DEFERRED_JS, GD.perf.MARK_BEFORE_DEFERRED_JS, GD.perf.MARK_AFTER_DEFERRED_JS);
					
					GD.perf.measure(GD.perf.MEASURE_DOM_CONTENT_LOADED, 'navigationStart', 'domContentLoadedEventEnd');
					GD.perf.measure(GD.perf.MEASURE_PERCEIVED_LOAD, 'navigationStart', GD.perf.MARK_PERCEIVED_LOAD);
				});
  </script>
  <script>
   GD.perf.mark(GD.perf.MARK_PERCEIVED_LOAD);
  </script>
